docstring.long_description:
This filter takes a few inputs: the sample_rate (will be passed as a parameter if the target node is not connected), the window type of the filter, the cutoff frequency, and the number of taps (or length) of the filter.

Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair
    The data to apply a FIR filter to.
docstring.short_description: Apply a low-pass FIR filter to an input vector. The filter is designed with the window method.

parameters.name: sample_rate
parameters.description: the amount of samples within a second

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: the window function used in the FIR

parameters.name: cutoff_low
parameters.description: the frequency cutoff to filter out the lower frequencies

parameters.name: cutoff_high
parameters.description: the frequency cutoff to filter out the upper frequencies

returns.description:
x: time domain
y: filtered signal
